dialog.text: Hello! Welcome to Aster Yellows meadow! (click text box to continue)
Your goal is to return this empty plane of dirt into the lush meadow it once was!
Let's start by planting some seeds! Use WASD or the arrow keys to move, and click on a patch of soil to plant a seed!
Great job! Plant as many seeds as you'd like-- I gave you a lot!
The seeds will grow on their own, but you can also use the wateirng can to make them grow faster!
Oh no! One of your flowers is starting to wilt-- maybe you should try watering it?
hmm I think it still looks thirsty, why don't you try watering it again?'
Oops it seems this flower now has an incurable disease...
Oh right-- here's 'the item for curing wilty plants-- silly me!
Give it a try! This plant is a lost cause but uh.. Looks like some of your other plants are looking a bit sad!
Great job! Looks like the flower is happy again!
Now that you've got the hang of this, I'll make things more interesting and speed up time a bit!
Yikes-- you've let more than half of our meadow become infected.
Oh no?? What's this?? The disease is spreading on its own?
